TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DayRenderEventHandler(object sender, DayRenderEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DayRenderEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DayRenderEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DayRenderEventArgs)
public delegate void DayRenderEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DayRenderEventArgs ^ e);
type DayRenderEventHandler = delegate of obj * DayRenderEventArgs -> unit

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 表示處理 控制項之 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 雖然不支援資料繫結控制項，它是可修改的內容與個別日期儲存格的格式。Although data binding is not supported for the control, it is possible to modify the content and formatting of the individual date cells. 之前控制項是否顯示在網頁上時，它會建立組合的組成控制項的元件。Before the control is displayed on a Web page, it creates and assembles the components that make up the control. 就會引發事件當每個日期格建立控制項。The event is raised when each date cell in the control is created. 您可以控制內容和提供的事件處理常式的程式碼建立時，[日期] 資料格的格式事件。You can control the contents and formatting of a date cell when it is created by providing code in the event handler for the event. 如需有關自訂的日期 儲存格內容的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information on customizing the contents of a date cell, see . 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要使事件與您的事件處理常式產生關聯，請將委派的執行個體 (Instance) 加入至事件。To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時就會呼叫事件處理常式。The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需有關事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何指定及程式碼的處理常式讓背景色彩黃色顯示的月份中日期的事件。The following code example demonstrates how to specify and code a handler for the event to make the background color yellow for the days in the displayed month. 它也會示範如何藉由新增自訂資料格內容控制項加入儲存格。It also demonstrates how to customize the contents of a cell by adding a control to the cell. [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Calendar.DayRender Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Calendar.DayRender Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/CS/calendardayrendercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CalendarDayRender#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CalendarDayRender/VB/calendardayrendervb.aspx#1)]
